geodata-desc: Adds geografical coordinates storage an retrieval functionality
geodata-bad-input: Invalid arguments hae been passed tae the <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> function
geodata-multiple-primary: <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki>: canna hae mair nor ane primar tag per page
geodata-limit-exceeded: The leemit o $1 <nowiki>{{#coordinates:}}</nowiki> {{PLURAL:$1|tag|tags}} per page haes been exceedit
geodata-broken-tags-category-desc: The page haes ae malformed {{#coordinates:}} tag.
geodata-unknown-type-category: Pages wi unkent teep o coordinates
geodata-unknown-type-category-desc: The page uises aen onkent value o the type boondin fer coordinates.
geodata-unknown-globe-category-desc: This page uises aen onkent value o the globe boondin fer coordinates.
geodata-unknown-region-category-desc: This page uises aen onvalid value o the region boondin fer coordinates.
geodata-api-help-coordinates-format: Format: Latitude an langitude separatit bi pipe (<kbd>|</kbd>).
